name: Cute Pets Run 3D
description:
Tap to turn the cute pets, collect coins and unlock all characters!

Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive action game.

Suitable for all ages and enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Have fun !

■Game center support:
Compare your best top score with others in the world.

■Social sharing:
Share your new score and challenge with your friends.
